publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3483 Mr Frank McAveety: Congratulations to Glasgow Wildcats Netball Team—That the Parliament congratulates the Glasgow Wildcats for their victory against the Brunel Hurricanes in the Cooperative Netball Superleague match on Monday 8 February 2009; praises the Glasgow girls’ team for winning its first superleague match against the Brunel Hurricanes who were playing at their home ground, the Guildford Spectrum; wishes the Wildcats the best of luck for their next big game on 9 March 2009 at Kelvin Hall International Sports Arena, which will be televised on Sky Sports Xtra, and notes with pride that this win is an extra boost for sport in Glasgow ahead of the 2014 Games. Supported by: Angela Constance*, Margaret Curran*, Bill Kidd*, Mary Mulligan*, James Kelly*, Paul Martin*, Bob Doris*, Kenneth Gibson*, Sandra White*, Karen Gillon*, David Stewart*, Robin Harper*
S3M-3483 Congratulations to Glasgow Wildcats Netball Team (lodged on 19 February 2009) Trish Godman*
S3M-3483 Congratulations to Glasgow Wildcats Netball Team (lodged on 19 February 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-3483 Congratulations to Glasgow Wildcats Netball Team (lodged on 19 February 2009) Hugh Henry*
S3M-3483 Congratulations to Glasgow Wildcats Netball Team (lodged on 19 February 2009) Jackie Baillie*
S3M-3483 Congratulations to Glasgow Wildcats Netball Team (lodged on 19 February 2009) Jack McConnell*
S3M-3483 Congratulations to Glasgow Wildcats Netball Team (lodged on 19 February 2009) Karen Whitefield*
